mapper.sql: SELECT G.GARAGE_NO garageNo , G.ALL_ADDRESS allAddress , G.REGION_SIDO regionSido , G.REGION_SIGUNGU regionSigungu , G.REGION_DONG regionDong , G.ADDRESS address , G.POST_ADD postAdd , G.ENROLL_DATE enrollDate , M.MEMBER_NICKNAME memberNickname , CASE WHEN G.STATUS = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN G.STATUS = 'N' THEN '사용중지' ELSE '알수없음' END AS statusName , G.WRITER writer , G.STATUS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EV_GARAGE ( GARAGE_NO, ALL_ADDRESS, REGION_SIDO, REGION_SIGUNGU, REGION_DONG, ADDRESS, POST_ADD, ENROLL_DATE, WRITER, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_EV_GARAGE.NEXTVAL, #{allAddress}, #{regionSido}, #{regionSigungu}, #{regionDong}, #{address}, #{postAdd}, SYSDATE, #{writer}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT REGION_SIDO regionSido , REGION_SIGUNGU regionSigungu , REGION_DONG regionDong FROM EV_GARAGE WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY REGION_SIDO , REGION_SIGUNGU , REGION_DONG ORDER BY REGION_SIDO , REGION_SIGUNGU , REGION_DONG ASC
FROM EV_GARAGE G JOIN EV_MEMBER M ON (G.WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE G.GARAGE_NO = #{ garageNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE EV_GARAGE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE GARAGE_NO = #{ garageNo }
